p: To investigate whether VGCV is active against Ad6 infection, we infected immunosuppressed hamsters with Ad5 or Ad6. To equalize the pathogenicity of the two viruses, we administered 10-fold less Ad6 than Ad5 (2 × 10 11 PFU/kg of Ad5 v. 2 × 10 10 PFU/kg of Ad6). VGCV was used at a dose and treatment schedule known to be effective against Ad5 (200 mg/kg b.i.d., starting one day before challenge) [ 25].
